gaidda.name: Black Cat
gaidda.playText: Whenever you draw a card, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 5 to draw a card.

gaidda.name: Elven Librarian
gaidda.playText: Whenever you discard a card, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 3 to draw a card.

gaidda.name: Lake of Purity
gaidda.playText: Whenever you draw a card, earn a coin.

gaidda.name: Greedy Vulture
gaidda.useText: Trade a card to earn 3 coins.
gaidda.playText: As an action, give a card to earn 4 coins.

gaidda.name: Lonely Wolf
gaidda.useText: Give a card to earn 5 coins.
gaidda.playText: Whenever a card is given to other player, earn a coin.

gaidda.name: Elven Hunter
gaidda.useText: Discard a card to deal 2 damage.
gaidda.playText: Whenever you discard a card, deal 1 damage.

gaidda.name: Poisonous Spider
gaidda.playText: Whenever you make someone discard a card, draw a card.

gaidda.name: Omont: The Bear King
gaidda.useText: Deal 2 damage to force the owner to discard a card.
gaidda.playText: Whenever you deal 2 or more damage, force the target's owner to discard a card.

gaidda.name: Haund: Ancient Tree
gaidda.useText: Draw 2 cards from either the deck or the discard pile.
gaidda.playText: As an action, pay a coin to draw a card from the discard pile.

gaidda.name: Sokel: Druid of Gaidda
gaidda.playText: Whenever anyone gives a card, you have priority. If you weren't the target, draw a card.

gaidda.name: Baby Sapling
gaidda.useText: Draw a card to make every player draw a card
gaidda.playText: Whenever you draw a card, charge 1. Uncharge 6 and sacrifice this to draw 6.

gaidda.name: Wanta: Dragon of Life
gaidda.useText: Draw a card from any graveyard 3 times.
gaidda.playText: Whenever a player obtains a card from any source, you may discard a card to force that player to give you that card.

noumi.name: Banker Gnome
noumi.playText: Whenever you earn coins, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 5 to earn 3 coins.

noumi.name: Traveling Salesman
noumi.playText: Whenever you draw a card, you may discard it to earn 3 coins.

noumi.name: Lake of Riches
noumi.playText: Whenever you lose coins, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 3 to deal 1 damage.

noumi.name: Humble Noble
noumi.playText: Whenever you lose coins, charge 1. If this has 3 counters, uncharge it to steal a coin.

noumi.name: Greedy Wizard
noumi.playText: Whenever you profit, profit 1 extra for every 3 coins of profit.

noumi.name: Mercenary
noumi.useText: Lose 4 coins to deal 1 damage twice.
noumi.playText: As an action, lose 3 coins to deal 1 damage.

noumi.name: Shiny Knight
noumi.playText: Whenever you use coins, charge 1. If this has 3, uncharge it to make a player lose 3 coins.

noumi.name: Royal Mint
noumi.playText: At the end of the turn, earn a coin.

noumi.name: Edenwr: Duke of Einde
noumi.playText: Whenever a player plays a card, steal 1 from that player.

noumi.name: Anangith: High Inquisitor
noumi.useText: Sacrifice a card you own to earn 15 coins.
noumi.playText: Whenever a card you own dies, earn 5 coins.

noumi.name: Beggar
noumi.useText: Earn 3 coins to make every player earn 3 coins.
noumi.playText: Whenever you earn coins, charge one. Uncharge 6 and sacrifice this to earn 18.

noumi.name: Veynu: Dragon of Greed
noumi.useText: Give any amount of coins to a player to take control of a card they have played of this value.
noumi.playText: Whenever any player spends gold, you can pay the same amount +2. If you do, you steal whatever effect they did.

ysault.name: Blacksmith
ysault.playText: After the end of your turn, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 3 to give 1 power.

ysault.name: War Horse
ysault.playText: Whenever you deal damage from other sources, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to deal 1 damage.

ysault.name: Lake of Power
ysault.playText: Whenever your cards are dealt damage, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to deal 1 damage.

ysault.name: Berserker
ysault.useText: Deal 1 damage to a card you own to deal 2 damage.
ysault.playText: As an action, deal 1 damage to this card to deal 1 damage. While this has 1 hp, at the end of the turn deal 1 damage.

ysault.name: Elite Archer
ysault.useText: Discard a card to deal 2 damage.
ysault.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 3 to deal 2 damage.

ysault.name: War Mage
ysault.playText: Whenever you lose blood drops, give 1 power to another card.

ysault.name: Dread Catapult
ysault.useText: Choose a player. At the end of the next turn, that player deals 1 damage to a card they own twice.
ysault.playText: Whenever a card you own is killed, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 1 to trigger its use effect.

ysault.name: Hisju: Hired Assassin
ysault.useText: Lose 9 coins to kill any non-legendary card.
ysault.playText: At the end of the turn, lose 2 coins. If you don't, sacrifice this. If you do, charge 1. As an action, uncharge 4 to kill any card.

ysault.name: Edoura: Necromancer
ysault.playText: Whenever a card you own is killed, charge 1. Uncharge 4 to resurrect any card. As an action, sacrifice a card to earn a blood drop.

ysault.name: Orsonn: Ysault's General
ysault.useText: Deal 1 damage to a card you own to give 3 power to another card.
ysault.playText: At the end of the turn, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to give 1 power to every other card you own.

ysault.name: Rookie Squire
ysault.useText: Deal 1 damage to make every player deal 1 damage.
ysault.playText: Whenever you deal damage, charge 1. Uncharge 6 and sacrifice this to give 1 power 6 times.

ysault.name: Nethse: Dragon of War
ysault.useText: Choose a player. That player must give you a blood drop. If they don't, they sacrifice a card and you earn a blood drop.
ysault.playText: Whenever damage is dealt to one of your cards, charge 1. Uncharge 3 to choose a player and deal 1 damage to every card that player owns. Repeat this effect for every 3 extra power this has.

seraneri.name: Streets Informant
seraneri.playText: Whenever any player sees, see the same thing.

seraneri.name: Clairvoyant
seraneri.playText: At the end of the turn, see 1.
